Caldera is a town on the coast of
. It has a pleasant main square and some beaches, but most people going to the beach head to nearby Bahía Inglesa.
There is a bus station about two blocks from the main square. In addition, all buses going to and from Copiapó can let you off near Caldera on Route 5. It's about a 30 minute walk to the center.

value: directions=two blocks north from main square
address=756 Avenida El Morro, Bahia Inglesa
content=Great waterfront restaurant with indoor or outdoor seating and great views of the beach. Marketed as a Thai restaurant, but the cuisine is a bit more eclectic than that.
directions=a block or two away from the main square, towards Route 5
content=Juices, drinks, cocktails, and snacks. Computers with internet ($600/hour or so) and wi-fi!
content=Simple accomodation, you can use the kitchen.
address=Camino Al Faro 1018, Mirador de Charito, Caldera

content=Cute lodge by the water with nice architecture and simple accommodations. Each apartment has a kitchen and access to the patio with firepits and barbecues. The owners (Rodrigo and Andrea) are extremely friendly and accommodating.

There is a woman who does a laundry service out of her house. If you are in the main square facing the church, walk up (south) on the street on the right of the church. In about 2 or 3 blocks, there is a sign for Lavandería and it has the address. You can also ask, everyone seems to know it.

value: - a lovely yet windy beach about 20 minutes away by collectivo. Costs about $1000 to get there.
